message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering the value it brings to your business, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $675,000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's worth, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to take advantage of.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $660,000. I believe this is a fair price that balances the value of the product with my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go below $670,000. I believe this is a fair price that still reflects the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'm offering the product to you for $670,000. This is a reasonable compromise that I hope you'll consider.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $665,000. I believe this is a fair price that balances the value of the product with my budget.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go below $668,000. I believe this is a fair price that still reflects the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'm offering the product to you for $668,000. This is a reasonable compromise that I hope you'll consider.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $662,000. I believe this is a fair price that balances the value of the product with my budget.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not getting any closer to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to know that you're serious about buying the product. I'm offering the product to you for $665,000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If you're still not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $660,000, which I believe is a fair price for the product. I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
